Peking Duck 
Ingredients: Instructions: In a bowl, mix soy sauce, honey, hoisin sauce, rice vinegar, minced garlic, five-spice 
powder, and grated ginger. Let rest before carving. Pork Schnitzel 
Ingredients: Instructions: In a large skillet, heat vegetable oil over medium heat. •  Brush the mixture over the duck. 
•  Place duck on a roasting rack and roast for 1 hour and 30 minutes until skin is crispy. 
• 
•  Serve duck with sliced green onions and mandarin pancakes. •  Return chicken to the skillet and cook until heated through. 
•  Serve warm. •  Season pork cutlets with salt and pepper. 
•  Dredge cutlets in flour, dip in beaten eggs, and coat with breadcrumbs. 
• 
•  Cook cutlets until golden and crispy on both sides. 
•  Serve with lemon slices. •  1 whole duck 
•  1/4 cup soy sauce 
•  1/4 cup honey 
•  2 tablespoons hoisin sauce 
•  2 tablespoons rice vinegar 
•  2 cloves garlic, minced 
•  1 teaspoon five-spice powder 
•  1 teaspoon grated ginger 
•  1/4 cup green onions, sliced 
•  Mandarin pancakes for serving •  4 pork cutlets 
•  1/2 cup flour 
•  2 eggs, beaten 
•  1 cup breadcrumbs 
•  1/4 cup vegetable oil 
•  1 lemon, sliced 
•  Salt and pepper to taste •  Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). 
• Quiche Lorraine 
Ingredients: Instructions: In a bowl, whisk eggs, heavy cream, salt, and pepper. Ramen 
Ingredients: Instructions: In a large pot, bring chicken broth, soy sauce, miso paste, minced garlic, and sliced 
ginger to a boil. In a skillet, cook sliced pork belly until crispy. onions, nori, and sesame seeds. •  Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes. 
• 
•  Cook ramen noodles according to package instructions. 
•  Divide noodles among bowls, top with broth, pork belly, soft-boiled eggs, sliced green •  Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). 
•  Place pie crust in a pie dish. 
•  Sprinkle cooked bacon, diced onion, and grated Gruyère cheese over the crust. 
• 
•  Pour egg mixture over the filling. 
•  Bake for 30-35 minutes until set and golden. 
•  Serve warm.

•  4 cups chicken broth 
•  1/4 cup soy sauce 
•  2 tablespoons miso paste 
•  2 cloves garlic, minced 
•  1 piece ginger, sliced 
•  1/2 pound pork belly, sliced 
•  4 eggs, soft-boiled 
•  8 ounces ramen noodles 
•  Sliced green onions, nori, and sesame seeds for garnish •  1 pie crust 
•  6 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled 
•  1 small onion, diced 
•  1 cup grated Gruyère cheese 
•  3 eggs 
•  1 cup heavy cream 
•  1/2 teaspoon salt 
•  1/4 teaspoon pepper •  Serve immediately. • Roast Beef 
Ingredients: Instructions: In a bowl, mix minced garlic, chopped rosemary, chopped thyme, olive oil, salt, and 
pepper. doneness. 
Let rest before slicing and serving. Salmon en Papillote 
Ingredients: Instructions: •  Rub the mixture over the beef roast. 
•  Place the roast in a roasting pan and cook for 1 hour and 30 minutes until desired •  Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). 
•  Cut parchment paper into large squares. 
•  Place a salmon fillet in the center of each square. 
•  Top with lemon slices, sliced onion, and sliced zucchini. 
•  Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with chopped dill, salt, and pepper. 
•  Fold the parchment paper over the salmon and seal the edges to form a packet. 
•  Place packets on a baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes until salmon is cooked •  1 beef roast (3-4 pounds) 
•  2 cloves garlic, minced 
•  1 tablespoon fresh rosemary, chopped 
•  1 tablespoon fresh thyme, chopped 
•  1/4 cup olive oil 
•  Salt and pepper to taste through. 
•  Serve warm. •  4 salmon fillets 
•  1 lemon, sliced 
•  1 small onion, sliced 
•  1 zucchini, sliced 
•  1/4 cup olive oil 
•  1 tablespoon fresh dill, chopped 
•  Salt and pepper to taste 
•  Parchment paper •  Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). 
• • Baked Ziti 
Ingredients: Instructions: In a skillet, cook ground beef or sausage with diced onion and minced garlic until 
browned.

In a baking dish, layer half the ziti, half the sauce, dollops of ricotta, and half the 
mozzarella. Repeat layers. Butter Chicken 
Ingredients: Instructions: •  Stir in marinara sauce, oregano, salt, and pepper, and simmer for 10 minutes. 
• •  Top with grated Parmesan cheese. 
•  Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden. 
•  Serve warm. •  Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). 
•  Cook ziti according to package instructions, then drain. 
• •  1 pound ziti pasta 
•  1 pound ground beef or Italian sausage 
•  1 small onion, diced 
•  2 cloves garlic, minced 
•  1 jar (24 ounces) marinara sauce 
•  1 cup ricotta cheese 
•  1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese 
•  1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese 
•  1 teaspoon dried oregano 
•  Salt and pepper to taste •  1 pound boneless chicken thighs, cubed 
•  1 cup plain yogurt 
•  1 tablespoon lemon juice 
•  2 cloves garlic, minced 
•  1 teaspoon grated ginger 
•  1 teaspoon garam masala 
•  1 teaspoon turmeric 
•  1 teaspoon cumin 
•  1 can (14.5 ounces) tomato puree 
•  1/2 cup heavy cream 
•  2 tablespoons butter 
•  Salt and pepper to taste 
•  Chopped cilantro for garnish 
•  Cooked rice or naan for serving Chili Con Carne 
Ingredients: Instructions: In a large pot, cook ground beef with diced onion and garlic over medium heat until 
browned. paprika. Gnocchi with Sage Butter 
Ingredients: Instructions: •  Stir in kidney beans, diced tomatoes, tomato paste, beef broth, chili powder, cumin, and In a bowl, mix yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, garam masala, turmeric, and cumin. 
Marinate chicken in the mixture for at least 1 hour. 
In a skillet, melt butter over medium heat. 
• 
•  Add marinated chicken and cook until browned. 
•  Stir in tomato puree and simmer for 20 minutes. 
•  Add heavy cream, season with salt and pepper, and simmer for another 10 minutes. 
•  Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

•  Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. 
•  Season with salt and pepper. 
•  Serve hot, garnished with shredded cheese and sour cream. •  1 pound ground beef 
•  1 small onion, diced 
•  2 cloves garlic, minced 
•  1 can (15 ounces) kidney beans, drained 
•  1 can (14.5 ounces) diced tomatoes 
•  1/4 cup tomato paste 
•  1 cup beef broth 
•  1 tablespoon chili powder 
•  1 teaspoon cumin 
•  1 teaspoon paprika 
•  Salt and pepper to taste 
•  Shredded cheese and sour cream for garnish •  1 pound potato gnocchi 
•  1/4 cup butter 
•  2 cloves garlic, minced 
•  8 fresh sage leaves 
•  1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese 
•  Salt and pepper to taste • • In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Honey Garlic Pork Ribs 
Ingredients: Instructions: In a bowl, mix honey, soy sauce, rice vinegar, garlic, and ginger. Pour over the ribs. caramelized. Moroccan Chicken Tagine 
Ingredients: •  Preheat oven to 300°F (150°C). 
•  Season ribs with salt, pepper, and paprika, then place in a baking dish. 
• 
•  Cover with foil and bake for 2.5 hours, basting occasionally with the sauce. 
•  Remove foil, increase oven to 400°F (200°C), and bake for 15-20 minutes until •  Cook gnocchi according to package instructions, then drain. 
• 
•  Add minced garlic and sage leaves, sauté until fragrant and sage is crispy. 
•  Add cooked gnocchi to the skillet and toss to coat in the butter sauce. 
•  Season with salt and pepper, and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. 
•  Serve warm. •  Garnish with green onions and serve. •  2 pounds pork ribs 
•  1/4 cup honey 
•  1/4 cup soy sauce 
•  2 tablespoons rice vinegar 
•  3 cloves garlic, minced 
•  1 teaspoon grated ginger 
•  1 teaspoon paprika 
•  Salt and pepper to taste 
•  Sliced green onions for garnish

•  4 chicken thighs 
•  1 small onion, diced 
•  2 cloves garlic, minced 
•  1 cup chicken broth 
•  1/2 cup dried apricots, chopped 
•  1/2 cup green olives 
•  1 tablespoon olive oil 
•  1 teaspoon cumin 
•  1 teaspoon cinnamon 
•  1 teaspoon turmeric 
•  Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: Mushroom Risotto 
Ingredients: Instructions: In a large skillet, heat olive oil and 1 tablespoon butter over medium heat. rice is creamy and tender (about 20 minutes). Pulled Pork Sandwiches 
Ingredients: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. 
• 
•  Brown chicken thighs on all sides, then set aside. 
•  Sauté onion and garlic until softened. 
•  Stir in cumin, cinnamon, and turmeric, then add chicken broth, apricots, and olives. 
•  Return chicken to the pot, cover, and simmer for 45 minutes until tender. 
•  Season with salt and pepper. 
•  Garnish with parsley and serve over couscous. •  Stir in remaining butter and Parmesan cheese, season with salt and pepper. 
•  Garnish with parsley and serve. •  Heat broth in a pot and keep warm. 
• 
•  Sauté onion, garlic, and mushrooms until tender. 
•  Add rice and stir for 1-2 minutes until lightly toasted. 
•  Pour in white wine and cook until absorbed. 
•  Add warm broth, one ladle at a time, stirring until absorbed before adding more, until •  Chopped parsley for garnish 
•  Cooked couscous for serving •  1 cup Arborio rice 
•  4 cups chicken or vegetable broth 
•  1 small onion, diced 
•  2 cloves garlic, minced 
•  1 cup mushrooms, sliced 
•  1/2 cup white wine 
•  1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese 
•  2 tablespoons butter 
•  2 tablespoons olive oil 
•  Salt and pepper to taste 
•  Chopped parsley for garnish •  2 pounds pork shoulder 
•  1 small onion, sliced 
•  2 cloves garlic, minced Instructions: Stuffed Chicken Breasts 
Ingredients: Instructions: In a bowl, mix spinach, feta, sun-dried tomatoes, and garlic. Vegetable Lasagna 
Ingredients:

•  Season pork shoulder with salt, pepper, and smoked paprika. 
•  Place onion and garlic in a slow cooker, then add pork. 
•  Mix barbecue sauce, chicken broth, and brown sugar, and pour over pork. 
•  Cook on low for 8 hours or high for 4 hours until pork shreds easily. 
•  Shred pork with forks and mix with sauce. 
•  Serve on buns with coleslaw if desired. •  Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). 
•  Cut a pocket into each chicken breast. 
• 
•  Stuff the mixture into the chicken pockets and secure with toothpicks if needed. 
•  Season chicken with salt and pepper. 
•  Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat and sear chicken on both sides. 
•  Transfer to a baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes until cooked through. 
•  Serve warm. •  4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts 
•  1/2 cup spinach, chopped 
•  1/2 cup feta cheese, crumbled 
•  1/4 cup sun-dried tomatoes, chopped 
•  2 cloves garlic, minced 
•  2 tablespoons olive oil 
•  Salt and pepper to taste •  1 cup barbecue sauce 
•  1/2 cup chicken broth 
•  1 tablespoon brown sugar 
•  1 teaspoon smoked paprika 
•  Salt and pepper to taste 
•  Buns for serving 
•  Coleslaw for topping (optional) •  9 lasagna noodles, cooked 
•  1 small onion, diced 
•  2 cloves garlic, minced 
•  1 zucchini, sliced Instructions: In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Sauté onion, garlic, zucchini, and bell pepper 
until tender. Add spinach and cook until wilted. 
In a bowl, mix ricotta cheese, egg, salt, and pepper. 
In a baking dish, spread a thin layer of marinara sauce. Layer 3 noodles, half the ricotta 
mixture, half the vegetables, and 1/3 of the mozzarella. Repeat layers. until bubbly. 
Let stand for 10 minutes before serving. •  Top with remaining noodles, marinara sauce, mozzarella, and Parmesan cheese. 
•  Cover with foil and bake for 25 minutes. Remove foil and bake for another 20 minutes

•  1 bell pepper, diced 
•  1 cup spinach, chopped 
•  1 jar (24 ounces) marinara sauce 
•  1 can (15 ounces) ricotta cheese 
•  1 egg 
•  1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese 
•  1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese 
•  2 tablespoons olive oil 
•  Salt and pepper to taste •  Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
